title: Ground News - “A phenomenal program”: Johnny Payne’s ministry with the Friendship House of Jesus - The Post-Searchlight
text: Giving up one’s time, to the point of dedicating year’s of one’s life, to serve their community requires a good deal of heart. It takes true passion to give so much of oneself to others. One organization in Bainbridge where one gives their time back to help the community is the Friendship House of Jesus. Having been founded in 1996, the Friendship House provides after-school ministry services to the local youth.
